depositStake(uint256,address).details: 必须附带 ETH，金额会被锁定

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).details: 只有 owner 在暂停状态下可以调用

returns._0: 合约当前 ETH 余额

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: 只有 owner 可以调用

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

releaseStake(uint256,address).details: 将质押金额添加到成员的待提取余额

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

slashStake(uint256,address,address).details: 将质押金额转移给接收者

params.recipient: 罚没金额接收者（通常是项目所有者）

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: 只有 owner 可以调用

withdrawFunds().details: 用户主动调用，防止重入攻击  安全模式：Checks-Effects-Interactions 1. Checks: 检查余额 2. Effects: 先更新状态 3. Interactions: 再转账

depositStake(uint256,address).notice: 存入质押（只能由 ProjectFactory 调用）

emergencyWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: 紧急提取（仅用于合约升级或紧急情况）

pendingWithdrawals(address).notice: 待提取金额：user => 可提取金额（Pull Payment 模式）

projectFactory().notice: ProjectFactory 合约地址（只有它能调用 stake 操作）

projectStakes(uint256,address).notice: 项目质押记录：projectId => member => 质押金额

releaseStake(uint256,address).notice: 释放质押（只能由 ProjectFactory 调用）

slashStake(uint256,address,address).notice: 罚没质押（只能由 ProjectFactory 调用）

taskManager().notice: TaskManager 合约地址（只有它能调用 release 操作）

withdrawFunds().notice: 提取可用资金（Pull Payment 模式）
